data.comment: Today's referee, Maurizio Mariani, has blown to start the match.
Milan take a 0-1 lead thanks to Rafael Leao.
In the minute 1, That's a fine assist from Hakan Calhanoglu.
Gian Marco Ferrari is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Milan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 6, Gian Marco Ferrari is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic is back in action after a slight knock.
Rafael Leao for Milan is whistled offside.
In the minute 8, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Filip Djuricic.
In the minute 9, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan's Alexis Saelemaekers has run offside.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Milan.
In the minute 16, Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
Domenico Berardi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Domenico Berardi is back on the pitch.
In the minute 17, Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Milan.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 18, Milan to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Franck Kessie for Milan is back on the field again.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Franck Kessie for Milan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Milan have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Alexis Saelemaekers for Milan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Milan.
In the minute 24, Sassuolo are pushing forward but Domenico Berardi's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 26, Alexis Saelemaekers puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Great play from Theo Hernandez to set up the goal.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 29, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Mapei Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sandro Tonali, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 31, Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Sandro Tonali is back on his feet again.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Milan.
Sandro Tonali (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Milan needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Milan at Mapei Stadium.
Theo Hernandez (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, In Reggio Emilia Milan drive forward through Hakan Calhanoglu. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo attack through Hamed Junior Traore. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Hamed Junior Traore of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Maurizio Mariani awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Can Sassuolo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Theo Hernandez.
In the minute 44, Theo Hernandez has recovered and rejoins the match in Reggio Emilia.
Milan's Rafael Leao misses with an attempt on goal.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Mapei Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Gian Marco Ferrari gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sassuolo drive upfield and Filip Djuricic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Milan defender.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
The home team have replaced Gregoire Defrel with Francesco Caputo. This is the first substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
In the minute 46, Giorgos Kyriakopoulos is replacing Rogerio for the home team.
The away team replace Sandro Tonali with Rade Krunic.
Maurizio Mariani awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Hamed Junior Traore gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
In the minute 53, Davide Calabria for Milan is back on the field again.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Davide Calabria for Milan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goal kick for Milan at Mapei Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 57, Jeremie Boga is on a sub for Filip Djuricic for Sassuolo.
Stefano Pioli is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Jens Hauge replacing Brahim Diaz.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo are coming forward and Domenico Berardi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Milan at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 61, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan's Franck Kessie has been booked in Reggio Emilia and will miss the next match through suspension.
Sassuolo make their fourth substitution with Mert Muldur replacing Jeremy Toljan.
In the minute 62, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Milan!
In the minute 65, Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Milan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Milan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sassuolo.
Davide Calabria for Milan has been booked by Maurizio Mariani and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Milan pushes forward through Rafael Leao, whose finish on goal is saved.
Milan's Alexis Saelemaekers breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 73, Sassuolo push forward at Mapei Stadium and Domenico Berardi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Milan defence.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Mehdi Bourabia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
Jens Hauge of Milan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 79, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Samu Castillejo is replacing Alexis Saelemaekers for the away team.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 80, In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Reggio Emilia Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu is caught offside.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Milan's area.
In the minute 84, Hamed Junior Traore of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Free kick Milan.
In the minute 86, Pedro Obiang is on a sub for Hamed Junior Traore for Sassuolo.
Milan make their fourth substitution with Daniel Maldini replacing Hakan Calhanoglu.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Sassuolo just outside Milan's area.
In the minute 88, At Mapei Stadium, Alessio Romagnoli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Sassuolo reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Domenico Berardi.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Milan.
Theo Hernandez is back on the pitch.
Milan are coming forward and Jens Hauge gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Maurizio Mariani awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Milan throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Domenico Berardi returns to the field for Sassuolo after picking up a slight injury.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Theo Hernandez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Domenico Berardi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
